languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит на вас ледяной взгляд.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, именем {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g} я изымаю население нижних уровней этого мануфакторума {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}для нужд Инквизиции{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит на вас ледяной взгляд.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, именем {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g} я изымаю население нижних уровней этого мануфакторума для нужд Инквизиции".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}for the purposes of the Inquisition{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит на вас ледяной взгляд.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, именем {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g} я изымаю население нижних уровней этого мануфакторума {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}для нужд Инквизиции{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix turns his icy gaze on you.{/n} "Rogue Trader, in the name of the Golden Throne, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum for the purposes of the Inquisition."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum for the purposes of the Inquisition."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着你，眼神冰冷。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，我以{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的名义，准备征用这座制造工厂的下层人口，用于{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}进行审判庭的工作{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}for the purposes of the Inquisition{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着你，眼神冰冷。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，我以{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的名义，准备征用这座制造工厂的下层人口，用于进行审判庭的工作。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada gélida.{/n} «{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, en nombre del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}, requiso la población de los niveles inferiores de este manufactorum para los {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}propósitos de la Inquisición{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}for the purposes of the Inquisition{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada gélida.{/n} «{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, en nombre del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}, requiso la población de los niveles inferiores de este manufactorum para los propósitos de la Inquisición».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは氷のように冷たい目であなたを見つめる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}よ、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の名において、{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}異端審問のため{/d}に、この聖工場の下層民の摘発を求める」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}for the purposes of the Inquisition{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは氷のように冷たい目であなたを見つめる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}よ、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の名において、{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}異端審問のため{/d}に、この聖工場の下層民の摘発を求める」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, sein Blick ist eiskalt.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}, im Namen des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} requiriere ich die Population der unteren Ebenen dieses Manufactorums {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}für die Zwecke der Inquisition{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}for the purposes of the Inquisition{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, sein Blick ist eiskalt.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, im Namen des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} requiriere ich die Population der unteren Ebenen dieses Manufactorums für Zwecke der Inquisition."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard glacial.{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g}, au nom du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, je réquisitionne la population des niveaux inférieurs du manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}pour les besoins de l'Inquisition{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}for the purposes of the Inquisition{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard glacial.{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}{/g}, au nom du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, je réquisitionne la population des niveaux inférieurs du manufactorum pour les besoins de l'Inquisition. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, buz gibi bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'ın{/g} bana verdiği yetkiye dayanarak bu manufaktorumun alt katlarında yaşayan nüfusa {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Engizisyon'un amaçları doğrultusunda{/d} el koyuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes ice-cold.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}, I am requisitioning the population of the lower levels of this manufactorum {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}for the purposes of the Inquisition{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, buz gibi bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}’ın bana verdiği yetkiye dayanarak bu manufaktorumun alt katlarında yaşayan nüfusa Engizisyon uğruna el koyuyorum.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
